subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist squared up as the Flyers’ Danny Briere bore down on him on a penalty shot with 19.6 seconds remaining to seal the Rangers’ victory in the Winter Classic.
snippet: Henrik Lundqvist squared up as the Flyers’ Danny Briere bore down on him on a penalty shot with 19.6 seconds remaining to seal the Rangers’ victory in the Winter Classic.
